comment.author: Miles
comment.text: Come one, Come ALL ye Deplorable, White Trash, Basement Dwellers, Super Predators, Bottom Feeders and what did she call the Evangelicals & Christians?? Backwards thinking people? Lets Make America Great Again!! Vote Trump in November! Better Together for Trump right?

replies.author: Kira
replies.text: Isn't it nice she calls all of us names. And she wants to lead this country? HEAVEN HELP US !!!!

replies.author: Duncan
replies.text: You are the first presidential candidate in history to ever be booed at this Memorial Foundation Dinner. It shows you do not have an understanding of how to comport yourself at presidential events. And that's the LEAST of the reasons you are not presidential. Go home, Dopey Donald. How about you spend your last healthy years actually raising your 10 year old son that you never have time for? Psssst, that's that short guy you sometimes see with Melania.
